EmailTemplate.name: NPS-2
EmailTemplate.subject: Luxury Presence Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our prior outreach.
We understand that your time is valuable, and truly appreciate your insights. Feedback is incredibly important in helping us improve our services for all our clients.
If you have any further comments or concerns, or if there's anything specific you'd like to discuss regarding your experience, please don't hesitate to reach out.
Thank you once again for your valuable feedback, and we look forward to hearing from you soon.
Thanks, The Luxury Presence Support Team
